entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sachigo Lake

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
